00025    /*
00026    * Constructor.
00027    */
00028    Linear::Linear() 
00029    : Species(),
00030      #ifdef INTER_ANGLE
00031      hasAngles_(0),
00032      #endif
00033      #ifdef INTER_DIHEDRAL
00034      hasDihedrals_(0),
00035      #endif
00036      maxPlacementAttempts_(200)
00037    {}

00045    /*
00046    * Build the chemical structure of a flexible chain molecule.
00047    */
00048    void Linear::buildLinear() 
00049    {
00050 
00051       // Preconditions
00052       if (nAtom() < 2) {
00053          UTIL_THROW("nAtom < 2");
00054       }
00055       if (nBond() != nAtom() - 1) {
00056          UTIL_THROW("nBond != nAtom - 1");
00057       }
00058       #ifdef INTER_ANGLE
00059       if (hasAngles_) {
00060          if (nAngle() != nAtom() - 2) {
00061             UTIL_THROW("nAngle != nAtom - 2");
00062          }
00063       }
00064       #endif
00065       #ifdef INTER_DIHEDRAL
00066       if (hasDihedrals_) {
00067          if (nAtom() > 3) {
00068             if (nDihedral() != nAtom() - 3) {
00069                UTIL_THROW("nDihedral != nAtom - 3");
00070             }
00071          } else {
00072             if (nDihedral() != 0) {
00073                UTIL_THROW("nDihedral != 0 when nAtom < 4");
00074             }
00075          }
00076       }
00077       #endif
00078 
00079       int i; 
00080 
00081       allocate();
00082 
00083       // Set Atom Type Ids
00084       for (i = 0; i < nAtom(); ++i) {
00085          setAtomType(i, calculateAtomTypeId(i));
00086       }
00087 
00088       // Build Bonds
00089       for (i = 0; i < nBond(); ++i) {
00090          makeBond(i, i, i+1, calculateBondTypeId(i));
00091       }
00092 
00093       #ifdef INTER_ANGLE
00094       // Build Angles 
00095       if (hasAngles_) {
00096          for (i = 0; i < nAngle(); ++i) {
00097             makeAngle(i, i, i+1, i+2, calculateAngleTypeId(i));
00098          }
00099       }
00100       #endif
00101 
00102       #ifdef INTER_DIHEDRAL
00103       // Build Dihedrals.
00104       if (hasDihedrals_) {
00105          for (i = 0; i < nDihedral(); ++i) {
00106             makeDihedral(i, i, i+1, i+2, i+3, calculateDihedralTypeId(i));
00107          }
00108       }
00109       #endif
00110 
00111    }
00112 
00116    bool Linear::tryPlaceAtom(Molecule& molecule, int atomId,
00117       DArray<double> exclusionRadius, System& system, CellList &cellList,
00118       BondPotential *bondPotentialPtr, const Boundary &boundary)
00119    {
00120       Atom& lastAtom = molecule.atom(atomId);
00121       Atom& thisAtom = molecule.atom(++atomId);
00122       Random& random = system.simulation().random();
00123 
00124       bool hasBeenPlaced = false;
00125 
00126       for (int iAttempt = 0; iAttempt < maxPlacementAttempts_; iAttempt++)
00127       {
00128          // draw a random bond vector
00129          int beta = 1;
00130          Vector v;
00131          random.unitVector(v);
00132          v *= bondPotentialPtr->randomBondLength(&random, beta,
00133             calculateBondTypeId(lastAtom.indexInMolecule()));
00134 
00135          Vector newPos;
00136          newPos = lastAtom.position();
00137          newPos += v;
00138          // shift into simulation cell
00139          boundary.shift(newPos);
00140 
00141          // check if the atom can be placed at the new position
00142          CellList::NeighborArray neighbors;
00143          cellList.getNeighbors(newPos, neighbors);
00144          int nNeighbor = neighbors.size();
00145          bool canBePlaced = true;
00146          for (int j = 0; j < nNeighbor; ++j) {
00147             Atom *jAtomPtr = neighbors[j];
00148          
00149             double r = sqrt(boundary.distanceSq(
00150                jAtomPtr->position(), newPos));
00151             if (r < (exclusionRadius[thisAtom.typeId()] +
00152                exclusionRadius[jAtomPtr->typeId()])) {
00153                canBePlaced = false;
00154                break;
00155             }
00156          } 
00157          if (canBePlaced) {
00158             // place the particle
00159             thisAtom.position() = newPos;
00160 
00161             // add to cell list
00162             cellList.addAtom(thisAtom);
00163 
00164             // are we add the end of the chain?
00165             if (atomId == molecule.nAtom()-1) 
00166               return true;
00167             
00168             // recursion step
00169             if (! tryPlaceAtom(molecule, atomId, exclusionRadius, system,
00170                cellList, bondPotentialPtr, boundary) ) {
00171                // If the next monomer cannot be inserted, delete this monomer
00172                // again
00173                cellList.deleteAtom(thisAtom);
00174             } else {
00175                hasBeenPlaced = true;
00176                break;
00177             }
00178          } 
00179       }
00180 
00181       return hasBeenPlaced;
00182    }
00183 
00187    void Linear::generateMolecules(int nMolecule, 
00188       DArray<double> exclusionRadius, System& system,
00189       BondPotential *bondPotentialPtr, const Boundary &boundary)
00190    {
00191       int iMol;
00192 
00193       // Set up a cell list with twice the maxium exclusion radius as the
00194       // cell size
00195       double maxExclusionRadius = 0.0;
00196       for (int iType = 0; iType < system.simulation().nAtomType(); iType++) {
00197          if (exclusionRadius[iType] > maxExclusionRadius)
00198             maxExclusionRadius = exclusionRadius[iType];
00199       }
00200 
00201       // the minimum cell size is twice the maxExclusionRadius,
00202       // but to save memory, we take 2 times that value 
00203       CellList cellList;
00204       cellList.allocate(system.simulation().atomCapacity(),
00205          boundary, 2.0*2.0*maxExclusionRadius);
00206 
00207       if (nMolecule > capacity())
00208          UTIL_THROW("nMolecule > Species.capacity()!"); 
00209 
00210       for (iMol = 0; iMol < nMolecule; ++iMol) {
00211          // Add a new molecule to the system
00212          Molecule &newMolecule= reservoir().pop();
00213          system.addMolecule(newMolecule);
00214 
00215          // Try placing atoms
00216          bool moleculeHasBeenPlaced = false;
00217          for (int iAttempt = 0; iAttempt< maxPlacementAttempts_; iAttempt++) {
00218             // Place first atom
00219             Vector pos;
00220             system.boundary().randomPosition(system.simulation().random(),pos);
00221             Atom &thisAtom = newMolecule.atom(0);
00222  
00223             // check if the first atom can be placed at the new position
00224             CellList::NeighborArray neighbors;
00225             cellList.getNeighbors(pos, neighbors);
00226             int nNeighbor = neighbors.size();
00227             bool canBePlaced = true;
00228             for (int j = 0; j < nNeighbor; ++j) {
00229                Atom *jAtomPtr = neighbors[j];
00230          
00231                double r = sqrt(system.boundary().distanceSq(
00232                                         jAtomPtr->position(), pos));
00233                if (r < (exclusionRadius[thisAtom.typeId()] +
00234                   exclusionRadius[jAtomPtr->typeId()])) {
00235                   canBePlaced = false;
00236                   break;
00237                }
00238             } 
00239             if (canBePlaced)  {
00240                thisAtom.position() = pos;
00241                cellList.addAtom(thisAtom);
00242 
00243                // Try to recursively place other atoms
00244                if (tryPlaceAtom(newMolecule, 0, exclusionRadius, system,
00245                   cellList, bondPotentialPtr, system.boundary())) {
00246                   moleculeHasBeenPlaced = true;
00247                   break;
00248               } else {
00249                  cellList.deleteAtom(thisAtom); 
00250               }
00251             }
00252          }
00253          if (! moleculeHasBeenPlaced) {
00254            std::ostringstream oss;
00255            oss <<  "Failed to place molecule " << newMolecule.id();
00256            UTIL_THROW(oss.str().c_str());
00257          }
00258 
00259       }
00260 
00261       #if 0
00262       // Check
00263       for (int iMol =0; iMol < nMolecule; ++iMol) {
00264          Molecule::AtomIterator atomIter;
00265          system.molecule(id(),iMol).begin(atomIter);
00266          for (; atomIter.notEnd(); ++atomIter) {
00267             for (int jMol =0; jMol < nMolecule; ++jMol) {
00268                Molecule::AtomIterator atomIter2;
00269                system.molecule(id(),jMol).begin(atomIter2);
00270                for (; atomIter2.notEnd(); ++atomIter2 ) {
00271                   if (atomIter2->id() != atomIter->id()) {
00272                      double r = sqrt(boundary.distanceSq(
00273                         atomIter->position(),atomIter2->position()));
00274                      if (r < (exclusionRadius[atomIter->typeId()]+
00275                         exclusionRadius[atomIter2->typeId()])) {
00276                         std::cout << r << std::endl;
00277                         UTIL_THROW("ERROR");
00278                      }
00279                   }
00280                }
00281             }
00282          }
00283       }
00284       #endif
00285 
00286    }
